nodes.text: There must be a complete ban on tree nuts and peanuts on planes.
dberger(395): There must be a complete ban on tree nuts and peanuts on planes.
Annot: There must be a complete ban on tree nuts and peanuts on planes.
It is a closed space.
dberger(395): It is a closed space.
Annot: It is a closed space.
I am allergic to peanuts and almonds
dberger(395): I am allergic to peanuts and almonds
Annot: I am allergic to peanuts and almonds
and I am impacted every time I fly.
dberger(395): and I am impacted every time I fly.
Annot: and I am impacted every time I fly.
A nut free zone does not work
dberger(395): A nut free zone does not work
Annot: A nut free zone does not work
since the dust from nuts gets in the closed air system of the plane.
dberger(395): since the dust from nuts gets in the closed air system of the plane.
Annot: since the dust from nuts gets in the closed air system of the plane.
For the time that people are on planes there should be consideration of others who have no control as to the reactions they have to nuts.
dberger(395): For the time that people are on planes there should be consideration of others who have no control as to the reactions they have to nuts.
Annot: For the time that people are on planes there should be consideration of others who have no control as to the reactions they have to nuts.
For almost all other foods the allergy only occurs if the food is ingested
dberger(395): For almost all other foods the allergy only occurs if the food is ingested
Annot: For almost all other foods the allergy only occurs if the food is ingested
so you can easily avoid the allergic reaction but not eating the food.
dberger(395): so you can easily avoid the allergic reaction but not eating the food.
Annot: so you can easily avoid the allergic reaction but not eating the food.
This is not true for many of us with nut allergies
dberger(395): This is not true for many of us with nut allergies
Annot: This is not true for many of us with nut allergies
we react if other people are eating the food
dberger(395): we react if other people are eating the food
Annot: we react if other people are eating the food
since it is an airborne allergy.
dberger(395): since it is an airborne allergy.
Annot: since it is an airborne allergy.
I do fly but I have to take multiple Benadryl pills every 4 hours to keep from reacting to the airborne dust of the nuts.
dberger(395): I do fly but I have to take multiple Benadryl pills every 4 hours to keep from reacting to the airborne dust of the nuts.
Annot: I do fly but I have to take multiple Benadryl pills every 4 hours to keep from reacting to the airborne dust of the nuts.
This works for now
dberger(395): This works for now
Annot: This works for now
but I always wonder when it will no longer be enough.
dberger(395): but I always wonder when it will no longer be enough.
Annot: but I always wonder when it will no longer be enough.
An epipen is not the answer
dberger(395): An epipen is not the answer
Annot: An epipen is not the answer
as it lasts only look enough for the plane to land
dberger(395): as it lasts only look enough for the plane to land
Annot: as it lasts only look enough for the plane to land
which is not a practical solution when you are flying on a long flight over water
dberger(395): which is not a practical solution when you are flying on a long flight over water
Annot: which is not a practical solution when you are flying on a long flight over water
and would certainly be a much greater inconvenience to the other passengers than a ban on nut products on planes if the plane was able to land.
dberger(395): and would certainly be a much greater inconvenience to the other passengers than a ban on nut products on planes if the plane was able to land.
Annot: and would certainly be a much greater inconvenience to the other passengers than a ban on nut products on planes if the plane was able to land.
The rules airlines have are ridiculous
dberger(395): The rules airlines have are ridiculous
Annot: The rules airlines have are ridiculous
Southwest is not nut free
dberger(395): Southwest is not nut free
Annot: Southwest is not nut free
they will not serve nuts
dberger(395): they will not serve nuts
Annot: they will not serve nuts
but if you fly a late flight the peanuts are all over the floor and seats.
dberger(395): but if you fly a late flight the peanuts are all over the floor and seats.
Annot: but if you fly a late flight the peanuts are all over the floor and seats.
Some other airlines have the rows around you 'nut free'
dberger(395): Some other airlines have the rows around you 'nut free'
Annot: Some other airlines have the rows around you 'nut free'
but advise you they can do nothing if the person seated next to you brings nuts on and wants to eat them.
dberger(395): but advise you they can do nothing if the person seated next to you brings nuts on and wants to eat them.
Annot: but advise you they can do nothing if the person seated next to you brings nuts on and wants to eat them.
Other airlines with advance notice will not serve nuts
dberger(395): Other airlines with advance notice will not serve nuts
Annot: Other airlines with advance notice will not serve nuts
but all airlines allow passengers to bring on foods including nuts
dberger(395): but all airlines allow passengers to bring on foods including nuts
Annot: but all airlines allow passengers to bring on foods including nuts
and will not stop the person from eating them if they wish to.
dberger(395): and will not stop the person from eating them if they wish to.
Annot: and will not stop the person from eating them if they wish to.
So you can have a 'nut free' flight and the person sitting next to you can take out their package of peanuts and eat away
dberger(395): So you can have a 'nut free' flight and the person sitting next to you can take out their package of peanuts and eat away
Annot: So you can have a 'nut free' flight and the person sitting next to you can take out their package of peanuts and eat away
and the airlines will do nothing to help you.
dberger(395): and the airlines will do nothing to help you.
Annot: and the airlines will do nothing to help you.
Again all nuts should be banned from airplanes unless it is your own private plane  then go ahead and eat what you want.
dberger(395): Again all nuts should be banned from airplanes unless it is your own private plane  then go ahead and eat what you want.
Annot: Again all nuts should be banned from airplanes unless it is your own private plane  then go ahead and eat what you want.
Moderator, why are you not asking those in support of this where their responsibility comes into play . . .?
ricport(344): Moderator, why are you not asking those in support of this where their responsibility comes into play . . .?
Annot: Moderator, why are you not asking those in support of this where their responsibility comes into play . . .?
I think they all use their responsibility by continuing to take the medications needed in a reaction,
ambersky(302): I think they all use their responsibility by continuing to take the medications needed in a reaction,
Annot: I think they all use their responsibility by continuing to take the medications needed in a reaction,
but as others have said epinephrine only lasts 1520 minutes,
ambersky(302): but as others have said epinephrine only lasts 1520 minutes,
Annot: but as others have said epinephrine only lasts 1520 minutes,
then the person needs other medical intervention.
ambersky(302): then the person needs other medical intervention.
Annot: then the person needs other medical intervention.
everyone is responsible for themselves AND their effects on others.
dadwith4yearold(424): everyone is responsible for themselves AND their effects on others.
Annot: everyone is responsible for themselves AND their effects on others.
ever hear of involuntary manslaughter?
dadwith4yearold(424): ever hear of involuntary manslaughter?
Annot: ever hear of involuntary manslaughter?
I don't see the supporters shirking responsibility.
elizwestley(376): I don't see the supporters shirking responsibility.
Annot: I don't see the supporters shirking responsibility.
I see them saying that even when they do everything they can, it's not enough to stay alive.
elizwestley(376): I see them saying that even when they do everything they can, it's not enough to stay alive.
Annot: I see them saying that even when they do everything they can, it's not enough to stay alive.
Not when on a flight without hospital access.
elizwestley(376): Not when on a flight without hospital access.
Annot: Not when on a flight without hospital access.
Please be specific in areas that you are seeing within this discussion that show lack of responsibility on behalf of supporters.
elizwestley(376): Please be specific in areas that you are seeing within this discussion that show lack of responsibility on behalf of supporters.
Annot: Please be specific in areas that you are seeing within this discussion that show lack of responsibility on behalf of supporters.
Actually I read a lot about dying here
JJMurray(365): Actually I read a lot about dying here
Annot: Actually I read a lot about dying here
but can anyone provide a single statistic of how many people have died from peanut allergies onboard an airplane?
JJMurray(365): but can anyone provide a single statistic of how many people have died from peanut allergies onboard an airplane?
Annot: but can anyone provide a single statistic of how many people have died from peanut allergies onboard an airplane?
How about how many people die from peanut allergies in the US each year?
JJMurray(365): How about how many people die from peanut allergies in the US each year?
Annot: How about how many people die from peanut allergies in the US each year?
I know that the "estimates" are that .6 to 1.5% of the US population may be allergic to peanuts.
JJMurray(365): I know that the "estimates" are that .6 to 1.5% of the US population may be allergic to peanuts.
Annot: I know that the "estimates" are that .6 to 1.5% of the US population may be allergic to peanuts.
And I found the following in a story
JJMurray(365): And I found the following in a story
Annot: And I found the following in a story

"In 2004, the Centers for Disease Control cited just 14 deaths due to anaphylaxis. The only known registry of deaths from anaphylaxis noted 33 deaths between 1994 and 1999. Remember, all of these estimates refer to the total number of people who had an anaphylactic reaction for any reason, not just from peanuts or other foods."

JJMurray(365): "In 2004, the Centers for Disease Control cited just 14 deaths due to anaphylaxis. The only known registry of deaths from anaphylaxis noted 33 deaths between 1994 and 1999. Remember, all of these estimates refer to the total number of people who had an anaphylactic reaction for any reason, not just from peanuts or other foods."

Annot: "In 2004, the Centers for Disease Control cited just 14 deaths due to anaphylaxis. The only known registry of deaths from anaphylaxis noted 33 deaths between 1994 and 1999. Remember, all of these estimates refer to the total number of people who had an anaphylactic reaction for any reason, not just from peanuts or other foods."
but I have yet to find anything I can pin down that says how many people REALLY die from a peanut allergy each year.
JJMurray(365): but I have yet to find anything I can pin down that says how many people REALLY die from a peanut allergy each year.
Annot: but I have yet to find anything I can pin down that says how many people REALLY die from a peanut allergy each year.
To me it seems pretty obvious that people with peanut allergies do fly (as many here have stated they do)
JJMurray(365): To me it seems pretty obvious that people with peanut allergies do fly (as many here have stated they do)
Annot: To me it seems pretty obvious that people with peanut allergies do fly (as many here have stated they do)
and yet as far as I can tell no one has died.
JJMurray(365): and yet as far as I can tell no one has died.
Annot: and yet as far as I can tell no one has died.
So, why are we even discussing banning peanuts when they have not killed a single person on an airplane?
JJMurray(365): So, why are we even discussing banning peanuts when they have not killed a single person on an airplane?
Annot: So, why are we even discussing banning peanuts when they have not killed a single person on an airplane?
Once again we see the attitude of everyone must change for a few, a very few.
JJMurray(365): Once again we see the attitude of everyone must change for a few, a very few.
Annot: Once again we see the attitude of everyone must change for a few, a very few.
This allergy is yours and yours to deal with,
JJMurray(365): This allergy is yours and yours to deal with,
Annot: This allergy is yours and yours to deal with,
why in the world do you expect all of the rest of us to change anything in our own lifestyles to accommodate you?
JJMurray(365): why in the world do you expect all of the rest of us to change anything in our own lifestyles to accommodate you?
Annot: why in the world do you expect all of the rest of us to change anything in our own lifestyles to accommodate you?
As it is, you have a solution,
JJMurray(365): As it is, you have a solution,
Annot: As it is, you have a solution,
you take Benadryl when you fly.
JJMurray(365): you take Benadryl when you fly.
Annot: you take Benadryl when you fly.
Great.
JJMurray(365): Great.
Annot: Great.
Other people need to take other medication to fly as well to deal with their own issues/problems also which they have no control over.
JJMurray(365): Other people need to take other medication to fly as well to deal with their own issues/problems also which they have no control over.
Annot: Other people need to take other medication to fly as well to deal with their own issues/problems also which they have no control over.
Should we therefore make exceptions for all of them as well?
JJMurray(365): Should we therefore make exceptions for all of them as well?
Annot: Should we therefore make exceptions for all of them as well?
I say no.
JJMurray(365): I say no.
Annot: I say no.
There are steps you can personally take to deal with your own allergy
JJMurray(365): There are steps you can personally take to deal with your own allergy
Annot: There are steps you can personally take to deal with your own allergy
but instead you insist that everyone else take steps so that you don't have to.
JJMurray(365): but instead you insist that everyone else take steps so that you don't have to.
Annot: but instead you insist that everyone else take steps so that you don't have to.
Sorry, I'm not accepting that.
JJMurray(365): Sorry, I'm not accepting that.
Annot: Sorry, I'm not accepting that.
